text.section: Except as otherwise provided in this section, whenever any license issued under this article has been lost or destroyed, the license issuing authority issuing such a license shall have the power, upon application under oath, and upon payment of a fee of $1, to issue another license, upon which shall be endorsed the word "duplicate" in addition to all of the information which appeared upon the original license.
In Prince George's County, the fee for a duplicate license is $10.

section.section: This subsection applies only in Baltimore City.
An establishment with multiple public areas in which alcoholic beverages are sold shall display a duplicate license in each area.
The fee for a duplicate license is $20.

text.section: In Garrett County, the fee for a duplicate license is $10.
In Anne Arundel County, the Board of License Commissioners shall determine the fee for a duplicate license.
